timeline.message: First batch of updates to change binaries to being resource in deposit model, so that properties can be stored for each of them
Update transfer job to new binary model. Include sha1 in binary details
Add helper methods for working with datastreams
Fix PID of mods history datastream
Add migration and deposit of fits history files

timeline.bodyText: Are we verifying that fits history is being transferred?
